title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 6F.104 - SANDBLASTING Sign (NYW8-43)
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 6F.104 - SANDBLASTING Sign (NYW8-43)

State Regulations

Option: 01 The SANDBLASTING (NYW8-43) sign (see Sign Drawing
SD-W30) may be used to warn of work sites where sandblasting is being conducted
and airborne dust or debris might at times drift into the roadway. Guidance: 02 The SANDBLASTING sign should be displayed only while
sandblasting is occurring. It should be removed, covered, or faced away from
traffic when sandblasting operations are not being carried out. Where used, the
SANDBLASTING sign should be placed a suitable distance in advance of the
sandblasting area. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
6F.104

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
